verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We will bless the Lord at all times; His praise Shall be in our mouths, and our souls shall take All our joy from the Lord, And His saints all shall hear And rejoice with us.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing to Jesus all His saints, Sing to Jesus all His saints, Sing to Jesus all his saints, And rejoice with us.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, you children of His own, All our hearts to Him are known, He has brought us to His throne, Zion is our home.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O come taste and see that the Lord is good, And He feeds His own with the living food. He has made us His house, Living stones all are we And His royal priesthood.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing, let Jesus Christ be known, He has brought his people home, He redeems His servants â€“ all Those who trust in Him.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: We will bless the Lord at all times; His praise Shall be in our mouths, and our souls shall take All our joy from the Lord, And His saints all shall hear And rejoice with us.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sisters: Sing to Jesus all His saints, Sing to Jesus all His saints, Sing to Jesus all His saints, And rejoice with us.{/lang-eng}
